name: CANDLE (CRIAMALDITA, Ary, Synmad, letitzoom)
description:
CANDLE was developed during the 2nd stage of Rosario Game Lab 2022, with the challenge of developing an "Escape Room" in one month.

After the event concluded, the project continued with 2 weeks of hard work, polishing everything we could polish.

With this release we intend that users report possible problems and hopefully we will release its version 1.1.

Made by

Alice Abonizio - Programmer, narrative designer, game designer
Ary Clementino - Soundtrack, sound designer
Luca Salum - Lead game designer
Lucas Zvala - Artist
